home.content: Welcome to my collection of iconic Kpop Girl Groups. If I find the time will add more groups in the future. Thanks Tanner Dolby for this awesome gallery template!

featured.content: There's a thing called bias in the Kpop world. It means which group is your absolute favourite. SNSD introduced me to the world of Kpop. I watched their shows while I was losing faith in myself in college... My bias is Twice üòÇ!!

about.content: I'm a 27yo guy who fell in love with Kpop while struggling in college. I also love korean variety shows. One day I'll be a successful Kpop fan üòÅ‚ú®!
